description:
http://www.thedmscraft.com/
For more information on DM crafting visit my website and see what you need for your starting DM crafting kit:

STOCK UP FOR THIS CRAFT! (You help the channel with every purchase)

Surebonder Gluegun: https://amzn.to/2KB1ooa

Surebonder Nozzle Replacements: https://amzn.to/2M3npBG

Surebonder All-Temp Glue Sticks: https://amzn.to/2vu9LwR

Craft Paint Set (Basic Colors): https://amzn.to/2OlJvfg

Craft Paint Set (Best Sellers): https://amzn.to/2OMtkJ3

Craft Paintbrush Set: https://amzn.to/2vpkLvM

Elmer's Glue-All Gallon: https://amzn.to/2ISM2w4

The Tabletop Crafters Guild Site:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft
title: Easiest Stone Textured Gridded Tiles for D&D (DM's Craft #169)
